Package com.company.main

Class Game

java.lang.Object
com.company.main.Game
public class Game
extends java.lang.Object
Main Class that the game is run from.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    Game()
    Sets default level to a Level1 object.

  • Constructor Details

    • Game

      public Game()
      Sets default level to a Level1 object. Initialises Mouse-listeners and Key-Listeners, as well as the Frame in which the game takes place. Utilises the CardLayout in order to differentiate between Main Menu screen and Game screen.

  • Method Details

    • main

      public static void main​(java.lang.String[] args)
      Main method of the class.
      Parameters:
      args -

    • goToNextLevel

      public void goToNextLevel()
      Updates the level after it is completed. Responsible for the lateral movement through the levels. Transfers the old stats to the new level, updates Listeners and Music.

    • transferStats

      public void transferStats​(int oldHealth, int oldScore, int oldCheck)
      Transfers the stats from the previous level over to the next level.
      Parameters:
      oldHealth - Health from previous level
      oldScore - Score from previous level
      oldCheck - Checkpoint variable which is either 0 or 1, according to whether the checkpoint in level 2 has been passed or not.

    • getWorld

      public GameLevel getWorld()
      Getter for the Level the game is pointing to
      Returns:
      Current Level

    • setWorld

      public void setWorld​(GameLevel world)
      Setter for the Level the game is pointing to
      Parameters:
      world - New level to be pointed to

    • getView

      public MyView getView()
      Getter for the current View
      Returns:
      Current View

      public Controller getHeroController()

      Returns:

      Returns:
      Track for level 3

    • isFirstStart

      public boolean isFirstStart()
      Used for Main Menu to Game transition, in order to be able to stop the Music and resume it.
      Returns:
      Whether it is the first time the player hits Play in the Main Menu.

    • setFirstStart

      public void setFirstStart​(boolean firstStart)
      Setter for the FirstStart boolean variable
      Parameters:
      firstStart - Whether it's the first time the Player hits Play in the Main Menu.

    • isTutorial

      public boolean isTutorial()
      Control variable for whether the player is in the Tutorial.
      Returns:
      Whether player is in the tutorial.

    • setTutorial

      public void setTutorial​(boolean tutorial)
      Setter for the tutorial variable
      Parameters:
      tutorial - Whether player is in the tutorial.
